name.title: WyzeRoboVac
name.description: This name will appear in your Homebridge log

username.title: Username (E-Mail Address)
username.description: The e-mail address used for your Wyze account

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used for your Wyze account

mfaCode.title: One-time Password (for two-factor authentication)
mfaCode.description: Only required for initial login if you have two-factor authentication enabled on your Wyze account

statusCheckRefreshInterval.title: Status Check Refresh Interval
statusCheckRefreshInterval.description: Specify the number of milliseconds to wait between status checks, default is 30000 ms (30 seconds). Minimum is 10000ms (10 seconds)

batteryCheckRefreshInterval.title: Battery Check Refresh Interval
batteryCheckRefreshInterval.description: Specify the number of milliseconds to wait between battery checks, default is 120000 ms (2 min). Minimum is 60000ms (1 min)

path2py_stubs.title: Path to Python helper scripts
path2py_stubs.description: The location where the Python helper scripts are installed

debugLevel.title: Debug Level
debugLevel.description: Specify the Debug Level. 0 ==> no debug output, 1 ==> debug output to Homebridge logfile, 2 ==> system level logging
